data.name: SpellSlingers
data.detailed_description:
SpellSlingers is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and Rogue-lite elements. You can't hide, You must survive and get as much gold as possible to power up your next SpellSlinger, Unlock Achievements, Get Skills and upgrade your abilities so you can go even further on your next run.

—-- Discord Group Link (Soon) —---

—-- Content in Early Access So far —---
Over 15 Skills and Abilities
Over 20 Enemies
In Game Achievement System
Steam Achievements
Upgrade System
Loot & Resource System
Bosses
2 Levels - For now
Reward Gem - Boss/Elite Pickable Item
and many more


Before you begin your adventure

Make sure you have some offensive skills.
Grab as many exp orbs as possible.
Experiment with different builds.
Use elites to evolve your skills.
Use various points of interest to your advantage.

data.short_description: Cut down Thousands of enemies, from the undead to the mysterious creatures of the night to save the world from the impending doom, Spellslingers is a Fantasy Rogue-lite where you fight hordes of enemies with casual elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, GeForce GTX 770 / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, GeForce GTX 980 Ti / Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
